bibl.title: Politika Rima i Meroe v Severnoj Nubii I v. do n.e. - V v. n.e. Avec résumé en anglais: The Policy of Meroe and Rome in Lower Nubia in the 1st Century B.C. and the 5th Century A.D.
bibl.note: Kormyseva E.E., Politika Rima i Meroe v Severnoj Nubii I v. do n.e. - V v. n.e. Avec résumé en anglais: The Policy of Meroe and Rome in Lower Nubia in the 1st Century B.C. and the 5th Century A.D.
